WorkItem.Description: I am using excel data reader of v2.1 The attached report is an excerpt from autogenerated report which I need to read and actual data do not start from row 1 and cell A. Could we have like StartRowIndex and StartCellIndex configuration properties to populate DataSet only with meaningful data which contain only data from data rows and not from first 6 rows and column A?
WorkItem.Summary: Report with data starting from row index other than 0.

Comments.Message: Data can continue in the next sheet but they start from row with index 0 in this case.

I understand why you want, but it is not likely to get done unless a lot of people want this. It shouldn't be too hard to do though, if you want to have a go yourself. Submit a patch and I'll try and incorporate it.
